scripts.build: del-cli dist && tsc -d --declarationDir dist/types -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist/es6 && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/es6/index.js -o dist/games.js -f umd -n Games
scripts.dist: del-cli dist && tsc -d --declarationDir dist/types -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist/es6 && rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/es6/index.js -o dist/games.js -f umd -n Games && uglifyjs dist/games.js > dist/games.min.js
scripts.doc: del-cli doc && typedoc --hideGenerator --mode file --out doc src/ --name Games
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently --raw --kill-others "tsc --watch -d --declarationDir dist/types -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist/es6" "rollup -c rollup.config.js dist/es6/index.js -w -o dist/games.js -f umd -n Games"
